informationCollection.title: Information Collection
informationCollection.description: After subscribing, information about your level, lifestyle, and goals will be collected, such as: weight, height, and photos (girls are not allowed to send photos and measurements are sufficient).

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: The answers will be saved in the Gymmawy training system, and conversations and messages will be stored to protect the trainees' rights.

socialMediaSharing.title: Social Media Sharing
socialMediaSharing.description: After achieving results, you will be asked, Gymmawy, if you allow sharing the results on social media, and you have the full right to refuse.
